posts.title: Top Deejay headphones
posts.author: John Doe
posts.content: Many years ago, I worked for my parents who own a video production company. Because it is a family business, you inevitably end up wearing many hats and being the czar of many different jobs. I mainly managed projects and worked as a video editor.

posts.title: Trust in your intuition
posts.author: Jennifer Freeman
posts.content: Once I gave the headphones a thorough once-over exam, I tried them on. As I mentioned, they have a classic over-the-ear style and just looking at them, the padding on the ear pieces seem adequate and the peak of the headband seemed to be a bit lacking, but you donâ€™t really know comfort unless you try on the product.

posts.title: Working from your home?
posts.author: Willie Clark
posts.content: Naturally, my first impression of these headphones is based off of the look of them. They have a classic over-the-ear style that is highlighted by a blue LED light that indicates the power for the noise canceling. The padding on the ear pieces seems adequate for extended usage periods.
